source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SEQ_00<tab>Swift has a message for you from General Raubahn.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SEQ_00<tab>不滅隊のスウィフト大闘佐は、冒険者に調査の礼をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SEQ_01<tab>General Raubahn has summoned you to a private meeting in the Fragrant Chamber, at which he wishes to discuss the results of your investigation, as well as his own. Alphinaud has already been notified, and will be waiting for you outside. Proceed to the Royal Promenade and speak with Bartholomew.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SEQ_01<tab>スウィフト大闘佐は、ラウバーンが冒険者を呼んでいることを伝えた。ウルダハの「香煙の間」に向かおう。香煙の間へは、ザル回廊のロイヤル・プロムナードにいる「バーソロミュー」が案内してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SEQ_02<tab>There are men and women who will not scruple to set the world ablaze in the pursuit of power. Teledji Adeledji is one such man, having orchestrated the refugee uprising from the start. General Raubahn and the sultana believe that he intends to exploit the chaos in order to gain control of the Carteneau Flats, in which an Allagan creation not unlike the Ultima Weapon has been discovered. Were someone to harness the power of this relic, they would have the strength to subjugate all of Eorzea─or so it is feared. Yet despite having learned of Teledji Adeledji's schemes, it would seem that your allies are not yet ready to move against him...
target: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SEQ_02<tab>香煙の間で、アルフィノとともに、ラウバーンとナナモの話を聞いた。裏で暴動を先導していたのは、砂蠍衆のテレジ・アデレジなのだという。彼は古代兵器「オメガ」を確保するため、「アウトロー戦区」となっているカルテノー平原を手中に収めたいらしい。今後も、難民問題には注意していこう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Bartholomew on the Royal Promenade.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_TODO_00<tab>ロイヤル・プロムナードのバーソロミューと話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SWIFT_000_000<tab>The Flame General left word that you were to proceed to the Fragrant Chamber as soon as you returned. He wishes to discuss your recent discoveries, as well as the results of our own investigation.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SWIFT_000_000ここまで力を尽くしてくれた貴公に、せめてもの礼だ。
……局長から、本件についての内密な話があるらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SWIFT_000_001<tab>Master Alphinaud has already been informed and should be waiting for you outside. Pray proceed to the Royal Promenade with all haste and speak with Bartholomew.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SWIFT_000_001すでにアルフィノ殿は、王宮の「香煙の間」に向かっている。
貴公も、ロイヤル・プロムナードの
「バーソロミュー」に案内を頼むがいい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SWIFT_000_010<tab>The sultana will be in attendance as well. Pray do not keep Her Grace waiting.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_SWIFT_000_010すでにアルフィノ殿は、王宮の「香煙の間」に向かっている。
貴公も、ロイヤル・プロムナードの
「バーソロミュー」に案内を頼むがいい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The information you brought us helped me persuade General Raubahn to call this meeting. Mayhap now we can discuss matters openly and honestly.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_ALPHINAUD_000_015君も来たか。
今度こそ、ラウバーン局長から、
核心が語られると良いのだが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_BARTHOLOMEW_000_020<tab>We have been expecting you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Please proceed inside.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE305_01446_BARTHOLOMEW_000_020ラウバーン局長から、お話は伺っています。
すでに、皆様がお待ちです。
「香煙の間」へご案内しましょう。
